title: Added an implementation of a multivariate normal distribution
body_html:
This also includes updates for the matrix constraints in distributions.constraints to handle batches of matrices.

Linear algebra operations fall back to python list comprehensions and torch.stack in a few cases, where batched versions are not yet available. In particular, this would benefit from a batched implementation of torch.potrf and a batched and differentiable torch.potrs or torch.trtrs.
body_text:
This also includes updates for the matrix constraints in distributions.constraints to handle batches of matrices.
Linear algebra operations fall back to python list comprehensions and torch.stack in a few cases, where batched versions are not yet available. In particular, this would benefit from a batched implementation of torch.potrf and a batched and differentiable torch.potrs or torch.trtrs.
body:
This also includes updates for the matrix constraints in `distributions.constraints` to handle batches of matrices.

Linear algebra operations fall back to python list comprehensions and `torch.stack` in a few cases, where batched versions are not yet available. In particular, this would benefit from a batched implementation of `torch.potrf` and a batched and differentiable `torch.potrs` or `torch.trtrs`.
